abstract: Tor Myhren’s promotion is the first time Grey New York will be led by its chief creative officer, a position he will keep.
snippet: Tor Myhren’s promotion is the first time Grey New York will be led by its chief creative officer, a position he will keep.
lead_paragraph: GREY, long dismissed as being as creative as its name, is giving a creative executive the job of leading its New York office, the agency’s largest, which produces campaigns for marketers like Canon, DirecTV, E*Trade, GlaxoSmithKline, Pfizer and Procter & Gamble.

headline.main: Grey New York to Be Led by Its Chief Creative Officer
headline.print_headline: Grey New York to Be Led by Its Chief Creative Officer
